Name: Fook Sing
Review Text: No consistent quality. We tried it twice, the first time is was OK and the second time it was horrible.

Name: Fook Sing
Review Text: I came here in the 90's, moved away and now I'm back and the place is still excellent. Good value for money. Next to the standard Chinese take away menu they have a few dishes that are a bit special and set them apart.
